description: Run by the Virgilio family since 1967, this popular restaurant pays tribute to historic Bari with its delicious fish dishes and specialities from Puglia. Don’t miss the grilled fish and the reinterpreted cannolo dessert made with sheep’s milk ricotta, pear sauce and pistachio waffles.
